competitors.notes: Major payroll and HR services for SMBs

competitors.name: Workday
competitors.notes: First cloud-native HRIS (launched 2005), gaining significant traction

competitors.name: SAP SuccessFactors
competitors.notes: Cloud-based HCM suite covering HR, payroll, talent

competitors.name: Ultimate Software

context: By 2010, the HCM market was shifting toward cloud-based solutions. Workday (launched 2005) was disrupting the traditional on-premise model. Ceridian was competing in both traditional payroll and developing cloud-based offerings.
